comments:
I20060704-0800

Sorry, I got it again, during applying the changes of a clean up run on a large project. It's a dup of Bug 57903.

Can you reproduce it on that large project? Which one was it?

Sorry, I'm not aible to reproduce it.

Here is what I did:
1. On JDT/UI select Source>Clean Up...
2. Select 'No blocks for single stmts' as the only clean up
3. Click finish
4. When the message on the progress bar is 'Performing changes...' click somewhere in the workbench. The UI is not responding (Bug 50144) and the exception was thrown.

I'll keep my eyes open...
The bug posted in comment 2 looks wrong.
Ooops, there are another 100000 bugs... The correct number is Bug 150144

Oh well, bad things happen if the shared scanner is accessed from different threads. Fixed that by no longer sharing the scanner and also added additional logging info in case the AIOOBE happens again.

Fixed in HEAD.
*** Bug 148263 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Verified in code of I20060807-2000 since there are no solid steps to reproduce.
*** Bug 189311 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
